item.title: Flash Flash Revolution
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

this version will allow you to play mutiplayer
[scar]
//Just Start a song and start the script.
//Recent Change: Now It Can play Mutiplayer Games
//It will miss an arrow that comes directly after the first
//It will miss if the Startscreen gets in the way
//It will miss on songs with the flashing squares background
//By MissSilabSoft,XxKanexX
program FlashFlashRevolution;
const
SongOver = 10365440;
Mutiplayer = 1; // 0 = no 1 = yes
CheckWaits = 3; //Wait every how many run throughs? (Lower more lag).
var
LeftArrow,RightArrow,DownArrow,UpArrow,LeftArrow2,DownArrow2,UpArrow2,RightArrow2:integer;
LeftPress,RightPress,UpPress,DownPress:Boolean;
LAX,LAY,RAX,RAY,DAX,DAY,UAX,UAY: Integer;
e: Integer;
procedure CheckArrows;
begin
repeat;
LeftArrow2:= GetColor(LAX,LAY);
RightArrow2:= GetColor(RAX,RAY);
DownArrow2:= GetColor(DAX,DAY);
UpArrow2:= GetColor(UAX,UAY);

if(not(LeftArrow2 = LeftArrow)) Then
begin
if(LeftPress = False) Then
SendArrowSilent(3);
LeftPress:= True;
end;
if(not(RightArrow2 = RightArrow)) Then
begin
if(RightPress = False) Then
SendArrowSilent(1);
RightPress:= True;
end;

if(not(DownArrow2 = DownArrow)) Then
begin
if(DownPress = False) Then
SendArrowSilent(2);
DownPress:= True;
end;

if(not(UpArrow2 = UpArrow)) Then
begin
if (UpPress = false) Then
SendArrowSilent(0);
UpPress:= True;
end;

if(LeftArrow2 = LeftArrow) Then
begin
LeftPress:=False
end;
if(RightArrow2 = RightArrow) Then
begin
RightPress:=False
end;
if(UpArrow2 = UpArrow) Then
begin
UpPress:=False
end;
if(DownArrow2 = DownArrow) Then
begin
DownPress:=False
end;
e:= e + 1;
if (e >= CheckWaits) then
begin
e:= 0;
Wait(1);
end;
until(GetColor(1,24) = SongOver);
end;

procedure GetArrowColor;
begin
LeftArrow:= GetColor(LAX,LAY);
RightArrow:= GetColor(RAX,RAY);
DownArrow:= GetColor(DAX,DAY);
UpArrow:= GetColor(UAX,UAY);
end;

procedure GetArrowPosition;
begin
if (mutiplayer = 0)then
begin
LAX:= 146;
LAY:= 83;
RAX:= 388;
RAY:= 81;
DAX:= 245;
DAY:= 78;
UAX:= 309;
UAY:= 51;
end;
if (mutiplayer = 1)then
Begin
LAX:= 4;
LAY:= 70;
RAX:= 262;
RAY:= 70;
DAX:= 100;
DAY:= 67;
UAX:= 173;
UAY:= 66;
end;
end;

begin
GetArrowPosition;
GetArrowColor;
CheckArrows;
end.
[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Flash Flash Revolution
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

here is a better version

[scar]
//Just Start a song and start the script.
//Recent Change: Dosn’t boo on side arrows anymore
//Recent Change: Grabs arrow at script start incase it changes from song to song
//It will miss an arrow that comes directly after the first
//It will miss if the Startscreen gets in the way
//It will miss on songs with the flashing squares background
//By MissSilabSoft,XxKanexX
program FlashFlashRevolution;
const
SongOver = 10365440;
CheckWaits = 3; //Wait every how many run throughs? (Lower more lag).
var
LeftArrow,RightArrow,DownArrow,UpArrow,LeftArrow2,DownArrow2,UpArrow2,RightArrow2:integer;
LeftPress,RightPress,UpPress,DownPress:Boolean;
e: Integer;
procedure CheckArrows;
begin
repeat;
LeftArrow2:= GetColor(146,82);
RightArrow2:= GetColor(388,81);
DownArrow2:= GetColor(245,78);
UpArrow2:= GetColor(309,51);

if(not(LeftArrow2 = LeftArrow)) Then
begin
if(LeftPress = False) Then
SendArrowSilent(3);
LeftPress:= True;
end;
if(not(RightArrow2 = RightArrow)) Then
begin
if(RightPress = False) Then
SendArrowSilent(1);
RightPress:= True;
end;

if(not(DownArrow2 = DownArrow)) Then
begin
if(DownPress = False) Then
SendArrowSilent(2);
DownPress:= True;
end;

if(not(UpArrow2 = UpArrow)) Then
begin
if (UpPress = false) Then
SendArrowSilent(0);
UpPress:= True;
end;

if(LeftArrow2 = LeftArrow) Then
begin
LeftPress:=False
end;
if(RightArrow2 = RightArrow) Then
begin
RightPress:=False
end;
if(UpArrow2 = UpArrow) Then
begin
UpPress:=False
end;
if(DownArrow2 = DownArrow) Then
begin
DownPress:=False
end;
e:= e + 1;
if (e >= CheckWaits) then
begin
e:= 0;
Wait(1);
end;
until(GetColor(1,24) = SongOver);
end;

begin
LeftArrow:= GetColor(146,82);
RightArrow:= GetColor(388,81);
DownArrow:= GetColor(245,78);
UpArrow:= GetColor(309,51);
wait(600);
CheckArrows;
end.
[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Flash Flash Revolution
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Maybe try waiting every now and then? I’ll show you what i mean, also i made the code a bit more formatted and prettifull. I hope you don’t mind:

[scar]
{ Just start the script after you start a song it does all easy and
standard flawlessly and gets pretty dam close on the harder ones }

program FlashFlashRevolution;
const
SongOver = 10365440;
LeftArrow = 0;
RightArrow = 5251393;
DownArrow = 5989023;
UpArrow = 7116981;

Const CheckWaits = 3; //Wait every how many run throughs? (Lower more lag).

var
LeftArrow2, DownArrow2, UpArrow2, RightArrow2: integer;
LeftPress, RightPress, UpPress, DownPress: Boolean;

procedure CheckArrows;
var e: Integer;
begin
repeat;
LeftArrow2 := GetColor(144, 82);
RightArrow2 := GetColor(400, 80);
DownArrow2 := GetColor(217, 85);
UpArrow2 := GetColor(333, 90);
if (not (LeftArrow2 = LeftArrow)) then
begin
if (LeftPress = False) then
SendArrowSilent(3);
LeftPress := True;
end;
if (not (RightArrow2 = RightArrow)) then
begin
if (RightPress = False) then
SendArrowSilent(1);
RightPress := True;
end;
if (not (DownArrow2 = DownArrow)) then
begin
if (DownPress = False) then
SendArrowSilent(2);
DownPress := True;
end;
if (not (UpArrow2 = UpArrow)) then
begin
if (UpPress = false) then
SendArrowSilent(0);
UpPress := True;
end;
if (LeftArrow2 = LeftArrow) then
begin
LeftPress := False
end;
if (RightArrow2 = RightArrow) then
begin
RightPress := False
end;
if (UpArrow2 = UpArrow) then
begin
UpPress := False
end;
if (DownArrow2 = DownArrow) then
begin
DownPress := False
end;
e:= e + 1;
if (e >= CheckWaits) then
begin
e:= 0;
Wait(1);
end;
until (GetColor(1, 24) = SongOver);
end;

begin
CheckArrows;
end.
[/scar]

Everytime it runs through it 3 times it will Wait(1). But it can be changed in a constance at the top of the script. If it works, tell me.

Read full topic

item.title: Flash Flash Revolution
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

This is my first attempt at a scar script and im sure ill be critized all too hell on it :p, it will hit every arrow perfectly on a standard or easy song however it boo’s on the left and right arrows ive tried mutiple things to fix it but i have not been sucessful, although it dosnt matter much a boo only takes 5 points away and does not break the combo. if you can fix the boo’s on the left and right arrow or know how to make it work better let me know like i said this was my first script which would be why i posted it here

[scar]//Just start the script after you start a song it does all easy and standard flawlessly and gets pretty dam close on the harder ones
program FlashFlashRevolution;
const
SongOver = 10365440;
LeftArrow = 0;
RightArrow = 5251393;
DownArrow = 5989023;
UpArrow = 7116981;
var
LeftArrow2,DownArrow2,UpArrow2,RightArrow2:integer;
LeftPress,RightPress,UpPress,DownPress:Boolean;

procedure CheckArrows;
begin
repeat;
LeftArrow2:= GetColor(144,82);
RightArrow2:= GetColor(400,80);
DownArrow2:= GetColor(217,85);
UpArrow2:= GetColor(333,90);

if(not(LeftArrow2 = LeftArrow)) Then
begin
if(LeftPress = False) Then
SendArrowSilent(3);
LeftPress:= True;

end;
if(not(RightArrow2 = RightArrow)) Then
begin
if(RightPress = False) Then
SendArrowSilent(1);
RightPress:= True;
end;

if(not(DownArrow2 = DownArrow)) Then
begin
if(DownPress = False) Then
SendArrowSilent(2);
DownPress:= True;
end;

if(not(UpArrow2 = UpArrow)) Then
begin
if (UpPress = false) Then
SendArrowSilent(0);
UpPress:= True;
end;

if(LeftArrow2 = LeftArrow) Then
begin
LeftPress:=False
end;
if(RightArrow2 = RightArrow) Then
begin
RightPress:=False
end;
if(UpArrow2 = UpArrow) Then
begin
UpPress:=False
end;
if(DownArrow2 = DownArrow) Then
begin
DownPress:=False
end;

until(GetColor(1,24) = SongOver);
end;

begin
CheckArrows;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
